pageProduct.name: Avene Revitalising Nourishing Cream 50ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Avène Revitalizing Nourishing Cream helps restore the natural beauty of dry sensitive skin by providing hydration, nourishment, energy and protection.
The new antioxidant Natural Berry Extract instantly delivers lipids to rebuild and strengthen the skin barrier so it’s able to maintain effective hydration and restore skin’s natural balance.
The skin is protected against external aggressors including free radicals, thanks to the antioxidant properties of Natural Berry Extract combined with Pre-tocopheryl, a Vitamin E precursor. Formulated with ingredients of plant origin and enhanced with Avène Thermal Spring Water, skin is deeply nourished, radiant and signs of fatigue fade for a healthy, glowing complexion.
The rich velvety texture is non-greasy and rapidly absorbed, providing long-lasting nourishment. Formulated to minimise the risk of allergic reaction, non-comedogenic and paraben free.
Apply morning and/or evening to the face and neckline, after cleansing.

Common Uses

Moisturiser care FACE For Dry Sensitive Skin

Ingredients

AVÈNE THERMAL SPRING WATER (AVENE AQUA)*. GLYCERIN. OCTYLDODECANOL. MINERAL OIL (PARAFFINUM LIQUIDUM). CETEARYL ALCOHOL. DIMETHICONE. ISODODECANE. METHYL GLUCETH-20. PENTYLENE GLYCOL. WATER (AQUA). SILICA. CETEARYL GLUCOSIDE. GLYCERYL STEARATE. PEG-100 STEARATE. BENZOIC ACID. CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE. ETHYLHEXYGLCERIN. FRAGRANCE (PARFUM). HYDROGENATED STARCH HYDROLYSATE. POLYACRYLATE-13. POLYISOBUTENE. POLYSOBUTENE. POLYSORBATE 20. RIBES RUBRYM (CURRANT) FRUIT EXTRACT (RIBES RUBRUM FRUIT EXTRACT)*. RUBIS IDAEUS (RASPBERRY) FRUIT EXTRACT (RUBIS IDAEUS FRUIT EXTRACT)*. SODIUM BENZOATE. SODIUM HYDROXIDE. SORBITAN ISOSTEARATE. TOCOPHEROL. TOCOPHERYL GLUCOSIDE. VACCINIUM MYRTILLUS FRUIT EXTRACT*. XANTHAN GUM. *NATURAL INGREDIENTS

Directions

Apply morning and/or evening to the face and neckline, after cleansing.
